subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Blue Devils (13-1) built a double-digit lead in the first half and survived a 21-point second half from Davidson guard Stephen Curry to escape with a 79-67 win over the Wildcats.
snippet: The Blue Devils (13-1) built a double-digit lead in the first half and survived a 21-point second half from Davidson guard Stephen Curry to escape with a 79-67 win over the Wildcats.
